com.artemis.utils

Class EntityBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.utils.EntityBuilder

  • public class EntityBuilder
extends Object
    Non-reusable entity creation helper for rapid prototyping. Discouraged for use other than rapid prototyping and simple games. Use ComponentMapper instead. Example: new Builder(world) .with(Pos.class, Anim.class) .tag("boss") .player("player1") .group("enemies") .build();
    Author:
    Daan van Yperen, Junkdog
    See Also:
    for a list of alternate ways to alter composition and access components.

      • player

        public EntityBuilder player(String player)
        Register entity with owning player. An entity can only belong to a single player at a time. Requires registered PlayerManager.
